description.part: I designed from concept to coding for Dr. Margaret
Bailey using Photoshop CS3 for the layout and the
slices to used to convert it to HTML. I hand
coded it with CSS positioning in Dreamweaver, using
the Photoshop HTML file for reference.
Working from colors from the banner designed by
illustrator Joe Dube, I designed the new layout for
WE@RIT. Using PHP, Javascript, HTML and CSS I
coded the design into their new website to launch
